Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Very good food with a wide range of choices on the menu, as well as daily specials.  Service was also nice.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Great food French-Spanish in a cosy little restaurant delivering a variety of tapas, must try squid fins, oyster, scallop, lambshank. But everything else also worth it. Reservation highly recommended

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Great food. Tapas style and full main courses available. Shared tapas and really enjoyed every dish.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text:
Very tasty food. We all enjoyed what we ordered.
The service was a little slow, especially considering we were the only ones in the restaurant. But the food does make up for it! â€¦

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: no draft beers, but they have moderate selection of bottled beer and a great selection of wine. â€¦

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: The best food i have ever tried! Very big choice, for vegetarians as well, the atmosphere is very cosy) super tasty! Very much recommended.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: This is a place where you can feel the passion for doing something special, a family restaurant with a great variety of tasty food. i was really impressed with their food and the coziness of the place.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Little but nice place. Very kind girls ans vert good food. It's better to book. Price very good . We have spent less than 20 euro eating meat and drinking bear. There is also a kids menÃ¹.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Small place next to busy cafe but don't pass it by. Fabulous tapas, french style.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: The staff are so friendly and accommodating. Small, intimate venue with soft lighting and easy listening music in the background. The food is absolutely without fault.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Truly amazing food, but the owner is quite racist, and favour people from Netherland. If you're an English speaker, only go to Narbonne if you have a lot of time ahead of you  because you're gonna wait for a while. The experience is still worth it though, which shows how great the food is!

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: 20min to take the order... 45min waiting for the meal, three little pieces of meat for 12,95 euro! If you don't speak dutch, you'd better eat elsewhere.

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: We had another great experience at Narbonne. The menu of the day contained some suprising fish dishes. We especially liked the French take on ceviche and the scallops in duck butter. The tender, fall of the bone lambs shank was once again simply unsurpassed. Thank you

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Order the lamb tagine. Divine

Name: Narbonne
Review Text: Everything is delicious.
